pkgmetadata.longdescription: Landmark Prediction of a Survival Outcome // Provides functions for landmark prediction of a survival outcome incorporating covariate and short-term event information. For more information about landmark prediction please see: Parast, Layla, Su-Chun Cheng, and Tianxi Cai. Incorporating short-term outcome information to predict long-term survival with discrete markers. Biometrical Journal 53.2 (2011): 294-307, doi:10.1002/bimj.201000150.
